net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.external

Class ViewResourceExternalAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.external.ViewResourceExternalAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, ActionListener, ExternalAction

    public final class ViewResourceExternalAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExternalAction, ActionListener
    Allows a resource to be viewed with an appropriate external viewer. The medium will decide how to find and launch the viewer according to the content type of the resource.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)
